description: Detailed monitoring dashboard for individual pgmoneta server instances. Shows server health, backup status, performance metrics, and storage utilization.

panels.description: PostgreSQL server connectivity status. Green = Online, Red = Offline.
panels.title: Server Status

panels.description: Configuration validation status. Green = Valid, Red = Invalid configuration detected.
panels.title: Configuration

panels.description: Current PostgreSQL timeline identifier for the server.
panels.title: Timeline

panels.description: Number of configured worker processes for parallel backup operations.
panels.title: Workers

panels.description: PostgreSQL data checksums status. Enabled provides data corruption detection.
panels.title: Checksums

panels.description: Total number of backup operations performed on this server.
panels.title: Operations

panels.description: Number of valid, verified backup snapshots available for this server.
panels.title: Valid Backups

panels.description: Number of invalid or corrupted backup snapshots detected.
panels.title: Invalid Backups

panels.description: Storage size of the most recent successful backup.
panels.title: Latest Backup Size

panels.description: Count of failed backup operations. Should be monitored and alerted on.
panels.title: Failed Operations

panels.description: Historical trend of backup duration in seconds. Useful for identifying performance degradation.
panels.title: Backup Duration History

panels.description: Backup throughput performance in MB/s. Higher values indicate better performance.
panels.title: Backup Throughput

panels.description: WAL streaming status. Active when PostgreSQL is streaming WAL to pgmoneta.
panels.title: WAL Streaming

panels.description: Workspace storage usage for temporary backup operations.
panels.title: Workspace Storage

panels.description: Comprehensive table showing all backup snapshots with detailed metrics.
panels.title: All Backups

panels.description: Total size of the backup directory for this server
panels.title: Backup Directory Size

panels.description: Total size of the WAL directory for this server
panels.title: WAL Directory Size

panels.description: Distribution of storage between backup and WAL directories
panels.title: Storage Distribution

panels.description: Historical trend of backup and WAL storage consumption
panels.title: Storage Growth Trend

panels.description: Total storage used by this server (backup + WAL)
panels.title: Total Server Storage

title: pgmoneta Server Details
